title: Reading Rooms
content: Creating spaces that ignite curiosity and foster inclusive learning for rural children. Our 310 sq ft reading room offers a haven for young readers, equipped with 1000 books, workstations, and optimal lighting

title: Restroom Stalls
content: Building child-friendly restroom stalls at Kith n Kin School, Auraiya, for a safer, comfortable, and hygienic experience. Each stall features age-appropriate design, durability, and eco-friendly practices.

title: Grid Design for Optimal Learning
content: Our modular grid units feature expandable semi-open spaces, fostering versatility for classrooms, labs, and play areas. Tailored to a rural infrastructure, this design ensures sustainable and scalable solutions for learning environments.

title: Pavilion School
content: Reimagining education with scattered enclosed spaces around a central street, fostering social interaction and modular flexibility.

title: School as a Street
content: Our innovative design concept features modular classrooms, interactive elements, and eco-friendly systems to enhance learning environments and community engagement.
